item.title:
和你一起打龙是我一生中最快乐的时光🫶 🫶 和我一起庆祝 34 岁，在家观看《年代巡礼（加长版）》，包括《万岁》🐉、《弓箭手》🏹 和《最狂野的梦想》🩵！
PS 你们可以嘲笑我过度使用千禧年表情符号，但 A) 没人会为自己是千禧一代而感到骄傲，B) 今天是我的生日，我可以免责！🎂
item.description:
I had the time of my life fighting dragons with youuuu 🫶 Celebrate 34 with me by watching The Eras Tour (Extended Version) including “Long Live” 🐉 “The Archer” 🏹 and “Wildest Dreams” 🩵 at home!

PS troll me all you want about my excessive and literal millennial emoji use but A) no one’s prouder to be a millennial and B) it’s my bday and today I am exempt! 🎂

taylor.lnk.to/TSTheErasTourA…

item.title: .@samlansky用词如此奇妙，十多年来我一直喜欢读他的作品。如果你曾经和他相处过，你就会知道他是那种最好的人：好奇。有兴趣。幽默风趣。耐人寻味，引人入胜。说到采访，我有很多问题，但我非常高兴能采访到他。看到史蒂维-尼克斯（Stevie Nicks）、格丽塔-葛韦格（Greta Gerwig）、尚达-莱姆斯（Shonda Rhimes）、菲比-布里吉斯（Phoebe Bridgers）、娜塔莉-梅因斯（Natalie Maines）、肯尼-切斯尼（Kenny Chesney）和卢西安-格莱格（Lucian Grainge）等我崇拜和敬仰的人的名言，我感到非常震惊。我很高兴他与麦迪逊和麦考尔的粉丝们交谈，他们是如此的能言善辩、忠诚善良。我真的在反思这一年，以及这一年之前的所有岁月。说多少次感谢都不为过。🥲
item.description:
.@samlansky has such a wondrous way with words, and I’ve loved reading his pieces for over a decade. If you’ve ever been around him, you know he’s just the best type of person: Curious. Interested. Hilarious. Intriguing and intrigued. I have tRuSt iSSueS when it comes to interviews but I couldn’t be happier that I did this one with him. I was blown away to see quotes from people I adore and admire like Stevie Nicks, Greta Gerwig, Shonda Rhimes, Phoebe Bridgers, Natalie Maines, Kenny Chesney, and Lucian Grainge. I was so happy he spoke to fans Madison and McCall who were so eloquent, loyal, and kind. I’m really reflecting on this year, and all the years that led up to it. Can’t say thank you enough times. 🥲

time.com/6342806/person-of-t…

item.title:
时代杂志我们想评选你为 "年度风云人物"。
我能带上我的猫吗
item.description:
Time Magazine: We’d like to name you Person of the Yea-

Me: Can I bring my cat.

nitter.x86-64-unknown-linux-gnu.zip/TIME/status/1732379845047283996#m

item.title:
女王邀请我去伦敦......✨👑✨ 文艺复兴：碧昂斯的电影正在上映！.....！
📷:Mason Poole / @KevinMazur
item.description:
Got invited to London by The Queen…✨👑✨ Renaissance: A Film by Beyoncé is in theaters now!!

📷: Mason Poole / @KevinMazur

item.title: 这太不真实了。我只想对世界上任何地方今年听过我音乐的人说，谢谢你们。被评为 Spotify 2023 年全球最受欢迎艺人，真的是你们能给我的最好的生日/节日礼物。今年我们在外面巡演的时候真的是最开心的一年，现在又有了这个。你是认真的吗？所以我一直在想一个感谢你们的方式，你们中的很多人都要求我把 "You're Losing Me (From The Vault) "放到流媒体上......所以给你们！你现在终于可以在任何地方收听了 💋
item.description:
Um ok this is unreal?? I just wanted to say to anyone who listened to my music this year, anywhere in the world, thank you. Getting named Spotify’s Global Top Artist in 2023 is truly the best birthday/holiday gift you could’ve given me. We’ve seriously had THE MOST fun this year out there on tour and now this. Are you serious. So I was trying to think of a way to thank you, and a lot of you have been asking me to put “You’re Losing Me (From The Vault)” on streaming... so here you go! You can finally listen EVERYWHERE now 💋

taylor.lnk.to/YLMfromthevaul…

item.title:
把巡演带到巴西是我多年来的梦想，那些歌迷让我大吃一惊。我们已经正式结束了 2023 Eras 巡演，我们在里约和圣保罗的 6 场演出为这一年画上了圆满的句号，观众们都非常热情。我非常感谢我的巡演团队、我的乐队、工作人员和舞者，感谢他们一年来为这场演出所付出的一切。对于前来观看演出的观众来说，是你们让这些体育场充满活力、充满激情，让我难以忘怀。能参与其中，我真的感到无比自豪和感动。2024 年再见 🎤 🎸 🎹 ✨
📷:Buda Mendes / @GettyImages
item.description:
Bringing a tour to Brazil has been something I’ve dreamt of for years, and those fans blew my expectations away. We’ve officially wrapped up the 2023 Eras Tour and we got to end the year with 6 shows in Rio and São Paulo, with the most magical crowds. I’m so grateful to my touring family, my band, crew and dancers for everything they put into this show all year. To the people who came to see it, you are what made those stadiums feel so alive and electric and unforgettable for me. Really just feeling so proud and moved by what I got to be a part of. See you in 2024 🎤 🎸 🎹 ✨

📷: Buda Mendes / @GettyImages

item.title: 大家好！基本上，我马上就要过生日了，我在想，为了庆祝我们一起度过的这一年，一个有趣的方式就是让大家可以在家观看《年代巡回演唱会电影》！非常高兴地告诉大家，包括 "最狂野的梦想"、"弓箭手 "和 "万岁 "在内的加长版电影将于 12 月 13 日开始在美国、加拿大和其他即将公布的国家提供点播租赁服务。
item.description: Hi! Well, so, basically I have a birthday coming up and I was thinking a fun way to celebrate the year we’ve had together would be to make The Eras Tour Concert Film available for you to watch at home! Very happy to be able to tell you that the extended version of the film including “Wildest Dreams,” “The Archer” and “Long Live” will be available to rent on demand in the US, Canada & additional countries to be announced soon starting on … you guessed it, December 13 🫶💋

item.title:
我们又回来了！在阿根廷开始《年代》巡演南美站=最棒的决定。我无法表达对布宜诺斯艾利斯观众的感激之情。我以前从未去过阿根廷，他们给了我们最激动人心的神奇回忆。感谢周五演出被推迟的歌迷们周日又赶回来，你们的热情和激动让我们感动不已。下周末见，里约！！💋🩵🔜
📷:@marceloendelli / @GettyImages
item.description:
Andddd we’re back at it! Starting off the South American leg of The Eras Tour in Argentina = best decision possible. I can’t even express my gratitude to the Buenos Aires crowds. I’d never been to Argentina before and they gave us the most electric, magical memories. Thanks to the amazing fans whose show was postponed Friday for coming back Sunday and blowing us away with your passion and excitement. See you next weekend, Rio!! 💋🩵🔜

📷: @marceloendelli / @GettyImages

item.title: 我喜欢雨中演出，但我绝不会让我的歌迷、我的表演者和工作人员陷入危险之中。我们已经将今晚在布宜诺斯艾利斯的演出改到了周日，因为天气实在是太混乱了，如果再想举办这场演唱会就太不安全了。好消息是我可以在阿根廷逗留更长的时间！"！
item.description: I love a rain show but I’m never going to endanger my fans or my fellow performers and crew. We’ve rescheduled tonight’s Buenos Aires show for Sunday due to the weather being so truly chaotic it would be unsafe to try and put on this concert. Good news is I get to stay in Argentina longer!!

item.title: 你会站在十英尺高的地方，我会说'我一直都知道'🥲 这首歌总是让我想起我的朋友杰克。这是我们一起创作的第一首歌，这些年来，看着他不断挑战自我，创作出美妙的艺术作品，我感到终生难忘。他比我大六岁，怎么可能还是我早熟的儿子呢？我们可能永远不会知道。"Sweeter Than Fiction (My Version)》现已在 Target 独家发售，采用 Tangerine 黑胶唱片🍊🩵。
item.description: There you’ll stand ten feet tall, I will say ‘I knew it all along’ 🥲 This song has always made me think of my friend Jack. It was the first song we made together and watching him challenge himself and make beautiful art over the years has been the thrill of a lifetime. How can he be 6 years older than me and also somehow still be my precocious young son? We may never know. “Sweeter Than Fiction (My Version)” is now available exclusively at Target on Tangerine vinyl 🍊🩵

item.title: 观看 @kendricklamar 创作和录制他在《坏血》混音版上的诗句，是我一生中最振奋人心的经历之一。回想起这次合作，我仍然充满自豪和感激，因为肯德里克提升了歌曲的格调，也提升了他对待身边每个人的方式。每当 "年代巡回演唱会 "上的观众高唱他的那句 "你原谅，你忘记，但你永远不会让它......消失！"时，我都会微笑。Kendrick 重新回到现场，重新录制《Bad Blood》，让我能够重新获得并拥有这首我引以为傲的作品，这对我来说是超现实的，也是令人困惑的。我非常高兴地宣布，《坏血》混音版（由 Kendrick Lamar 演唱）已在《1989 豪华版》中随处可见。🫶🩵
item.description:
Watching @kendricklamar create and record his verses on the Bad Blood remix was one of the most inspiring experiences of my life. I still look back on this collaboration with so much pride and gratitude, for the ways Kendrick elevated the song and the way he treats everyone around him. Every time the crowds on The Eras Tour would chant his line ‘you forgive, you forget, but you never let it… go!’, I smiled. The reality that Kendrick would go back in and re-record Bad Blood so that I could reclaim and own this work I’m so proud of is surreal and bewildering to me. I’m overjoyed to say that the Bad Blood Remix (featuring Kendrick Lamar) is available everywhere on the 1989 Deluxe Edition. 🫶🩵

taylor.lnk.to/1989TaylorsVer…

item.title: ✨🫶 我叫泰勒，出生于 1989 年 🫶✨
item.description:
✨🫶 My name is Taylor and I was born in 1989 🫶✨

taylor.lnk.to/1989TaylorsVer…

item.title: 你们把《Eras Tour Concert Film》变成了一部多么令人震撼的作品。我一直在看你们在影院里跳舞、蹦蹦跳跳、重现舞蹈编排、创造内部笑话、施法、订婚的视频，总之就是创造了我们所擅长的那种欢乐的混乱😇 我最喜欢你们做的一件事就是你们大力支持 Cruel Summer 的时候，我最后用它开始了 Eras Tour 的演出。看在过去的情分上，我发布了巡演的现场音频，这样我们就可以在家里和车里舒舒服服地大喊大叫了，另外还有 @LPGiobbi 的全新混音版😜 谢谢你们，非常感谢，永远感谢，哇哦，真是太感谢了！！！！
item.description:
What a truly mind blowing thing you’ve turned The Eras Tour Concert Film into. I’ve been watching videos of you guys in the theaters dancing and prancing and recreating choreography, creating inside jokes, casting spells, getting engaged, and just generally creating the exact type of joyful chaos we’re known for 😇 One of my favorite things you’ve done was when you supported Cruel Summer SO much, I ended up starting The Eras Tour show with it. For old times sake, I’m releasing the live audio from the tour so we can all shriek it in the comfort of our homes and cars PLUS a brand new remix by @LPGiobbi 😜 Thank you, so much, forever, wow, just thank you!!!

taylor.lnk.to/thecruelestsum…

item.title: 🩵 首演日 🩵 Andddd I can't really wrap my head around this but....看看你真的让我做了什么：由于空前的需求，我们将于本周四在美国和加拿大提前放映《Eras Tour Concert Film》！也就是......明天。我们还将增加周五和整个周末的放映时间。所有门票将于明早 10 点前发售。周五开始将在全球 90 个国家上映。非常感谢大家愿意观看这部电影 它生动地记录了我最喜欢的冒险经历年代之旅最棒的是，我们还在一起冒险。现在上车...
item.description: 🩵 PREMIERE DAY 🩵 Andddd I can’t really wrap my head around this but…. Look what you genuinely made me do: Due to unprecedented demand we’re opening up early access showings of The Eras Tour Concert Film on THURSDAY in America and Canada!! As in… TOMORROW. We’re also adding additional showtimes Friday and throughout the weekend. All tickets will be available by 10am tomorrow morning. And it’ll be showing starting Friday in 90 countries all over the world. I can’t thank you enough for wanting to see this film that so vividly captures my favorite adventure I’ve ever been a part of: The Eras Tour. And the best part is, it’s an adventure we’re still on together. 🫶 Getting in the car now…

item.title: 巡演并不是我们在全球范围内的唯一活动........🌎 我们非常高兴地告诉大家，《年代巡回演唱会》电影将于 10 月 13 日正式登陆全球影院！现在就可以在您当地的影院网站上购票！🩵
item.description: The tour isn’t the only thing we’re taking worldwide…….. 🌎 Been so excited to tell you all that The Eras Tour concert film is now officially coming to theaters WORLDWIDE on Oct 13! Tickets available now at taylor.lnk.to/TSTheErasTourF… or on your local theaters website! 🩵

item.title: 这是新的原声带🩵 以下是《1989》（我的版本）的封底和金库曲目名称 我迫不及待地想知道这张唱片的发行时间，真的。感谢你们的参与、探究和猜测，让这些揭秘变得如此有趣（毕竟这才是最好的乐趣😜）。
item.description: It’s a new soundtrack 🩵 Here are the back covers and vault track titles for 1989 (my version) I can’t wait for this one to be out, seriously. Thank you for playing along, sleuthing, puzzling and making these reveals so much chaotic fun (which is the best kind of fun, after all 😜)
